Edit

Properties summary

AllocationState
AllocationState

Gets or sets whether the pool is resizing.
AllocationStateTransitionTime
AllocationStateTransitionTime

Gets or sets the time at which the pool entered its current allocation state.
ApplicationPackageReferences
ApplicationPackageReferences

Gets or sets the list of application packages to be installed on each compute node in the pool.
AutoScaleEvaluationInterval
AutoScaleEvaluationInterval

Gets or sets the time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.
AutoScaleFormula
AutoScaleFormula

Gets or sets a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
AutoScaleRun
AutoScaleRun

Gets or sets the results and errors from the last execution of the autoscale formula.
CertificateReferences
CertificateReferences

Gets or sets the list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.
CloudServiceConfiguration
CloudServiceConfiguration

Gets or sets the cloud service configuration for the pool.
CreationTime
CreationTime

Gets or sets the creation time of the pool.
CurrentDedicated
CurrentDedicated

Gets or sets the number of compute nodes currently in the pool.
DisplayName
DisplayName

Gets or sets the display name for the pool.
EnableAutoScale
EnableAutoScale

Gets or sets whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.
EnableInterNodeCommunication
EnableInterNodeCommunication

Gets or sets whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.
ETag
ETag

Gets or sets the ETag of the pool.
Id
Id

Gets or sets a string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.
LastModified
LastModified

Gets or sets the last modified time of the pool.
MaxTasksPerNode
MaxTasksPerNode

Gets or sets the maximum number of tasks that can run concurrently on a single compute node in the pool.
Metadata
Metadata

Gets or sets a list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.
NetworkConfiguration
NetworkConfiguration

Gets or sets the network configuration for the pool.
ResizeError
ResizeError

Gets or sets details of any error encountered while performing the last resize on the pool.
ResizeTimeout
ResizeTimeout

Gets or sets the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.
StartTask
StartTask

Gets or sets a task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.
State
State

Gets or sets the current state of the pool.
StateTransitionTime
StateTransitionTime

Gets or sets the time at which the pool entered its current state.
Stats
Stats

Gets or sets utilization and resource usage statistics for the entire lifetime of the pool.
TargetDedicated
TargetDedicated

Gets or sets the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.
TaskSchedulingPolicy
TaskSchedulingPolicy

Gets or sets how the Batch service distributes tasks between compute nodes in the pool.
Url
Url

Gets or sets the URL of the pool.
UserAccounts
UserAccounts

Gets or sets the list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.
VirtualMachineConfiguration
VirtualMachineConfiguration

Gets or sets the virtual machine configuration for the pool.
VmSize
VmSize

Gets or sets the size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.

Properties

  • Edit
    AllocationState
    AllocationState

    Gets or sets whether the pool is resizing.

    public AllocationState? AllocationState { get; set; }Public Property AllocationState As AllocationState?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<AllocationState>
      Nullable(Of AllocationState)

    Remarks

    steady - The pool is not resizing. There are no changes to the number of nodes in the pool in progress. A pool enters this state when it is created and when no operations are being performed on the pool to change the number of dedicated nodes. resizing - The pool is resizing; that is, compute nodes are being added to or removed from the pool. stopping - The pool was resizing, but the user has requested that the resize be stopped, but the stop request has not yet been completed. Possible values include: 'steady', 'resizing', 'stopping'

  • Edit
    AllocationStateTransitionTime
    AllocationStateTransitionTime

    Gets or sets the time at which the pool entered its current allocation state.

    public DateTime? AllocationStateTransitionTime { get; set; }Public Property AllocationStateTransitionTime As Date?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)
  • Edit
    ApplicationPackageReferences
    ApplicationPackageReferences

    Gets or sets the list of application packages to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

    public IList<ApplicationPackageReference> ApplicationPackageReferences { get; set; }Public Property ApplicationPackageReferences As IList(Of ApplicationPackageReference)

    Property Value

    • IList<ApplicationPackageReference>
      IList(Of ApplicationPackageReference)
  • Edit
    AutoScaleEvaluationInterval
    AutoScaleEvaluationInterval

    Gets or sets the time interval at which to automatically adjust the pool size according to the autoscale formula.

    public TimeSpan? AutoScaleEvaluationInterval { get; set; }Public Property AutoScaleEvaluationInterval As TimeSpan?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

    Remarks

    This property is set only if the pool automatically scales, i.e. enableAutoScale is true.

  • Edit
    AutoScaleFormula
    AutoScaleFormula

    Gets or sets a formula for the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

    public string AutoScaleFormula { get; set; }Public Property AutoScaleFormula As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    This property is set only if the pool automatically scales, i.e. enableAutoScale is true.

  • Edit
    AutoScaleRun
    AutoScaleRun

    Gets or sets the results and errors from the last execution of the autoscale formula.

    public AutoScaleRun AutoScaleRun { get; set; }Public Property AutoScaleRun As AutoScaleRun

    Property Value

    • AutoScaleRun
      AutoScaleRun

    Remarks

    This property is set only if the pool automatically scales, i.e. enableAutoScale is true.

  • Edit
    CertificateReferences
    CertificateReferences

    Gets or sets the list of certificates to be installed on each compute node in the pool.

    public IList<CertificateReference> CertificateReferences { get; set; }Public Property CertificateReferences As IList(Of CertificateReference)

    Property Value

    • IList<CertificateReference>
      IList(Of CertificateReference)

    Remarks

    For Windows compute nodes, the Batch service installs the certificates to the specified certificate store and location. For Linux compute nodes, the certificates are stored in a directory inside the task working directory and an environment variable AZ_BATCH_CERTIFICATES_DIR is supplied to the task to query for this location. For certificates with visibility of 'remoteUser', a 'certs' directory is created in the user's home directory (e.g., /home/{user-name}/certs) and certificates are placed in that directory.

  • Edit
    CloudServiceConfiguration
    CloudServiceConfiguration

    Gets or sets the cloud service configuration for the pool.

    public CloudServiceConfiguration CloudServiceConfiguration { get; set; }Public Property CloudServiceConfiguration As CloudServiceConfiguration

    Property Value

    • CloudServiceConfiguration
      CloudServiceConfiguration

    Remarks

    This property and virtualMachineConfiguration are mutually exclusive and one of the properties must be specified. This property cannot be specified if the Batch account was created with its poolAllocationMode property set to 'UserSubscription'.

  • Edit
    CreationTime
    CreationTime

    Gets or sets the creation time of the pool.

    public DateTime? CreationTime { get; set; }Public Property CreationTime As Date?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)
  • Edit
    CurrentDedicated
    CurrentDedicated

    Gets or sets the number of compute nodes currently in the pool.

    public int ? CurrentDedicated { get; set; }Public Property CurrentDedicated As Integer?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)
  • Edit
    DisplayName
    DisplayName

    Gets or sets the display name for the pool.

    public string DisplayName { get; set; }Public Property DisplayName As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    The display name need not be unique and can contain any Unicode characters up to a maximum length of 1024.

  • Edit
    EnableAutoScale
    EnableAutoScale

    Gets or sets whether the pool size should automatically adjust over time.

    public bool ? EnableAutoScale { get; set; }Public Property EnableAutoScale As Boolean?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

    Remarks

    If true, the autoScaleFormula property must be set. If false, the targetDedicated property must be set.

  • Edit
    EnableInterNodeCommunication
    EnableInterNodeCommunication

    Gets or sets whether the pool permits direct communication between nodes.

    public bool ? EnableInterNodeCommunication { get; set; }Public Property EnableInterNodeCommunication As Boolean?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Boolean>
      Nullable(Of Boolean)

    Remarks

    This imposes restrictions on which nodes can be assigned to the pool. Specifying this value can reduce the chance of the requested number of nodes to be allocated in the pool.

  • Edit
    ETag
    ETag

    Gets or sets the ETag of the pool.

    public string ETag { get; set; }Public Property ETag As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    This is an opaque string. You can use it to detect whether the pool has changed between requests. In particular, you can be pass the ETag when updating a pool to specify that your changes should take effect only if nobody else has modified the pool in the meantime.

  • Edit
    Id
    Id

    Gets or sets a string that uniquely identifies the pool within the account.

    public string Id { get; set; }Public Property Id As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    The ID can contain any combination of alphanumeric characters including hyphens and underscores, and cannot contain more than 64 characters. It is common to use a GUID for the id.

  • Edit
    LastModified
    LastModified

    Gets or sets the last modified time of the pool.

    public DateTime? LastModified { get; set; }Public Property LastModified As Date?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)

    Remarks

    This is the last time at which the pool level data, such as the targetDedicated or enableAutoscale settings, changed. It does not factor in node-level changes such as a compute node changing state.

  • Edit
    MaxTasksPerNode
    MaxTasksPerNode

    Gets or sets the maximum number of tasks that can run concurrently on a single compute node in the pool.

    public int ? MaxTasksPerNode { get; set; }Public Property MaxTasksPerNode As Integer?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)
  • Edit
    Metadata
    Metadata

    Gets or sets a list of name-value pairs associated with the pool as metadata.

    public IList<MetadataItem> Metadata { get; set; }Public Property Metadata As IList(Of MetadataItem)

    Property Value

    • IList<MetadataItem>
      IList(Of MetadataItem)
  • Edit
    NetworkConfiguration
    NetworkConfiguration

    Gets or sets the network configuration for the pool.

    public NetworkConfiguration NetworkConfiguration { get; set; }Public Property NetworkConfiguration As NetworkConfiguration

    Property Value

    • NetworkConfiguration
      NetworkConfiguration
  • Edit
    ResizeError
    ResizeError

    Gets or sets details of any error encountered while performing the last resize on the pool.

    public ResizeError ResizeError { get; set; }Public Property ResizeError As ResizeError

    Property Value

    • ResizeError
      ResizeError

    Remarks

    This property is set only if an error occurred during the last pool resize, and only when the pool allocationState is Steady.

  • Edit
    ResizeTimeout
    ResizeTimeout

    Gets or sets the timeout for allocation of compute nodes to the pool.

    public TimeSpan? ResizeTimeout { get; set; }Public Property ResizeTimeout As TimeSpan?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<TimeSpan>
      Nullable(Of TimeSpan)

    Remarks

    This is the timeout for the most recent resize operation. (The initial sizing when the pool is created counts as a resize.) The default value is 15 minutes.

  • Edit
    StartTask
    StartTask

    Gets or sets a task specified to run on each compute node as it joins the pool.

    public StartTask StartTask { get; set; }Public Property StartTask As StartTask

    Property Value

    • StartTask
      StartTask
  • Edit
    State
    State

    Gets or sets the current state of the pool.

    public PoolState? State { get; set; }Public Property State As PoolState?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<PoolState>
      Nullable(Of PoolState)

    Remarks

    active - The pool is available to run tasks subject to the availability of compute nodes. deleting - The user has requested that the pool be deleted, but the delete operation has not yet completed. upgrading - The user has requested that the operating system of the pool's nodes be upgraded, but the upgrade operation has not yet completed (that is, some nodes in the pool have not yet been upgraded). While upgrading, the pool may be able to run tasks (with reduced capacity) but this is not guaranteed. Possible values include: 'active', 'deleting', 'upgrading'

  • Edit
    StateTransitionTime
    StateTransitionTime

    Gets or sets the time at which the pool entered its current state.

    public DateTime? StateTransitionTime { get; set; }Public Property StateTransitionTime As Date?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<DateTime>
      Nullable(Of DateTime)
  • Edit
    Stats
    Stats

    Gets or sets utilization and resource usage statistics for the entire lifetime of the pool.

    public PoolStatistics Stats { get; set; }Public Property Stats As PoolStatistics

    Property Value

    • PoolStatistics
      PoolStatistics
  • Edit
    TargetDedicated
    TargetDedicated

    Gets or sets the desired number of compute nodes in the pool.

    public int ? TargetDedicated { get; set; }Public Property TargetDedicated As Integer?

    Property Value

    • Nullable<Int32>
      Nullable(Of Int32)

    Remarks

    This property is not set if enableAutoScale is true. It is required if enableAutoScale is false.

  • Edit
    TaskSchedulingPolicy
    TaskSchedulingPolicy

    Gets or sets how the Batch service distributes tasks between compute nodes in the pool.

    public TaskSchedulingPolicy TaskSchedulingPolicy { get; set; }Public Property TaskSchedulingPolicy As TaskSchedulingPolicy

    Property Value

    • TaskSchedulingPolicy
      TaskSchedulingPolicy

    Url
    Url

    Gets or sets the URL of the pool.

    public string Url { get; set; }Public Property Url As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String
  • Edit
    UserAccounts
    UserAccounts

    Gets or sets the list of user accounts to be created on each node in the pool.

    public IList<UserAccount> UserAccounts { get; set; }Public Property UserAccounts As IList(Of UserAccount)

    Property Value

    • IList<UserAccount>
      IList(Of UserAccount)
  • Edit
    VirtualMachineConfiguration
    VirtualMachineConfiguration

    Gets or sets the virtual machine configuration for the pool.

    public VirtualMachineConfiguration VirtualMachineConfiguration { get; set; }Public Property VirtualMachineConfiguration As VirtualMachineConfiguration

    Property Value

    • VirtualMachineConfiguration
      VirtualMachineConfiguration

    Remarks

    This property and cloudServiceConfiguration are mutually exclusive and one of the properties must be specified.

  • Edit
    VmSize
    VmSize

    Gets or sets the size of virtual machines in the pool. All virtual machines in a pool are the same size.

    public string VmSize { get; set; }Public Property VmSize As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

    Remarks

    For information about available sizes of virtual machines for Cloud Services pools (pools created with cloudServiceConfiguration), see Sizes for Cloud Services (http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/cloud-services-sizes-specs/). Batch supports all Cloud Services VM sizes except ExtraSmall. For information about available VM sizes for pools using images from the Virtual Machines Marketplace (pools created with virtualMachineConfiguration) see Sizes for Virtual Machines (Linux) (https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-linux-sizes/) or Sizes for Virtual Machines (Windows) (https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/virtual-machines-windows-sizes/). Batch supports all Azure VM sizes except STANDARD_A0 and those with premium storage (STANDARD_GS, STANDARD_DS, and STANDARD_DSV2 series).
